title: nForce4
body: <p><a href="http://www.tomshardware.com/motherboard/20041020/index.html" title="NVIDIA Rushes Into PCI Express With nForce4">Tom's Hardware</a> reviewed <a href="http://www.nvidia.com/page/nforce4_family.html" title="nForce4 family">nVidia's latest/greatest mobo chipsets</a>.  The <a href="http://www.tomshardware.com/motherboard/20041020/nforce4-03.html" title="HT-link:1GHz; PCI-Express; USB2.0: 10 ports; SATA2: 4 ports 300MB/s; SN Engine; 7.1 Audio; nTune; SLI">features</a> that they have are pretty damn sweet.  32-bit PC enthusiasts will have to find newer excuses for not upgrading in late November when the actual boards are released.</p>
